text: Erbendorf () is a town in the Upper Palatinate in Germany. The following villages are incorporated into the town: Aschenhof, Birkenreuth, Boxdorf, Eppenhof, Frodersreuth, Glashütte, Gössenreuth, Gramlhof, Grötschenreuth, Hauxdorf, Inglashof, Napfberg, Neuenreuth, Pfaben, Plärn, Schadenreuth, Siegritz, Steinbach, Straßenschacht, Thann, Wäldern, Wetzldorf, and Wildenreuth. ==References== ==Other websites== *Homepage of the City of Erbendorf *Webcam Category:Tirschenreuth (district)
title: Erbendorf
